title: Brexit's Toll on the Business of Law
description:
Jeremy Hodges, of Bloomberg News, joins Casey Sullivan to discuss how Britain's vote to leave the European Union is affecting the business of law in the UK. Hodges provides an overview of the London legal market, the work (or lack thereof) that is coming to the biggest law firms as a result of Brexit, and big law mergers past and present.

Brought to you by: Bloomberg Law
www.bna.com/bloomberglaw?promocode=BLBBLAW

Subscribe to the Big Law Business podcast on iTunes.
